name: unnamedMemory
description:
unnamedMemory is the prototype for an experimental point&click adventure about changing memories to change yourself, in hopes of changing your future - and the consequences of this choice. 

As main character and player, your conscience was digitalized and is now being simulated. You have to traverse between unknown paths, find items and, through interpretation and thought, understand the connection between these items, Reminiscence Obstacles and Memory Rooms, eventually changing everything that is bad to something supposedly good.
